actionCalls.description: Send case creation email to the user.
actionCalls.name: SendEmailWhenCaseIsCreated
actionCalls.label: Send Email When Case is Created

value.stringValue: Your service request to Notify Travel Plans was created

assignments.description: Sets the values of the fields required to send an email.
assignments.name: AssignEmailPrerequisites
assignments.label: Assign Email Prerequisites

assignments.description: Assigns Alternate Phone Country Code from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the AlternatePhoneCountryCode Text variable.
assignments.name: SetAlternatePhoneCountryCode
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Alternate Phone Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the SetAlternatePhoneNumber Text variable..
assignments.name: SetAlternatePhoneNumber
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Phone from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Phone Text variable.
assignments.name: SetCardExpiryDates
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Card Names from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the CardNames String Collection variable.
assignments.name: SetCardNames
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Card Number from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the CardNumbers String Collection variable, and masks the card number so that only the last four digits are visible.
assignments.name: SetCardNumbers
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Date Of Departure from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the DateOfDeparture Text variable.
assignments.name: SetDateOfDeparture
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Date Of Return from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the DateOfReturn Text variable
assignments.name: SetDateOfReturn
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Domestic Destinations from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the DomesticDestination Text variable.
assignments.name: SetDomesticDestinations
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Email from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Email Text variable.
assignments.name: SetEmail
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns International Destinations from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the InternationalDestination Text variable.
assignments.name: SetInternationalDestinations
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Mobile from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Mobile Text variable.
assignments.name: SetMobile
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Phone from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Phone Text variable.
assignments.name: SetPhone
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

assignments.description: Assigns Role from the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop to the Roles String Collection variable.
assignments.name: SetRoles
assignments.label: Set Attribute Value

constants.description: Stores the address of the header image used in the email template.
constants.name: HeaderImageURL

decisions.description: Determines if the prerequisites to send an email are available or not.
decisions.name: HavePrerequisitesToSendAnEmail
decisions.label: Have Prerequisites To Send An Email?

decisions.description: Determines whether the email associated with the Account is available or not.
decisions.name: IsAccountEmailAvailable
decisions.label: Is Account Email Available?

decisions.description: Determines which attribute is stored in the current service catalog request extended attribute value record in the loop
decisions.name: SetWhichAttribute
decisions.label: Set Which Attribute?

Flow.description: Allows an agent to review the details of a customer's travel notification request.

formulas.description: Creates the account name by concatenating first name and last name.
formulas.name: AccountNameFormula

formulas.description: Adds a row for the alternate phone number in the email template.
formulas.name: AddAlternatePhoneRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!AlternatePhoneNumberFormula}<>'N/A' , '    Alternate Phone: '+''+ {!AlternatePhoneNumberFormula} +'
',' ')

formulas.description: Adds a row for the email in the email template.
formulas.name: AddEmailRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!Email}<>'N/A' , '    Email: '+''+ {!Email} +'
',' ')

formulas.description: Adds a row for the mobile in the email template
formulas.name: AddMobileRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!Mobile}<>'N/A' , '    Mobile: '+''+ {!Mobile} +'
',' ')

formulas.description: Adds a row for the phone in the email template.
formulas.name: AddPhoneRow
formulas.expression:
IF({!Phone}<>'N/A' , '    Phone: '+''+ {!Phone} +'
',' ')

formulas.description: Creates an alternate phone number by concatenating country code and phone number.
formulas.name: AlternatePhoneNumberFormula

formulas.description: Removes square braces from text collection CardNumbers variable
formulas.name: CardNumbersFormula

formulas.description: Masks the card numbers and show only the last four digits.
formulas.name: MaskedCardNumbersFormula

Flow.label: Review Travel Notification

loops.description: Iterates through Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Values from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
loops.name: IterateThroughServiceCatalogRequests
loops.label: Iterate Through Service Catalog Requests

recordLookups.description: Gets the service catalog request extended attribute value records with a record Id matching the SvcCatalogRequestId that was passed into the flow. Stores the results in the Service Catalog Request Extended Attribute Value collection variable.
recordLookups.name: GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes
recordLookups.label: Get Service Catalog Request Extended Attributes

textTemplates.description: Stores the body of the email thatâ€™s sent when a case is created.
textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!AccountName},
Your service request to travel plan notification was created and your case number is {!CaseNumber}.

Request Summary:
Cards Selected: {!CardNumbersFormula}
Departure Date: {!DateOfDeparture}
Return Date: {!DateOfReturn}
Domestic Destinations: {!DomesticDestination}
International Destinations: {!InternationalDestination}
Preferred Communication Method:
{!AddEmailRow} {!AddPhoneRow} {!AddMobileRow} {!AddAlternatePhoneRow}

Thank you,
Customer Support Team

variables.description: Stores the value of Account Email of the service catalog request extended attribute value record from GetServiceCatalogRequestExtendedAttributes.
